effect.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est mis K.O.
effect.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out.
effect.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival queda Fuera de Combate.
effect.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario viene messo KO.
effect.pt: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente é Nocauteado.
effect.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist kampfunfähig.

description.en: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
